citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on
02/22/2016.
The licensee's husband said that her work schedule had changed and she is now working from 7:00am-3:00pm on
Mondays.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

02/22/2016.
The licensee's husband said that her work schedule had changed and she is now working from 7:00am-3:00pm on
Mondays.
